title: Weird snake.

content:

Weird snake.

Advanced data
NPC IDhist

The weird snake was a tomato in disguise that was released with the Monkey Madness I quest.

Monkey Madness I was notorious for its idiosyncratic development and coding compared to the rest of the game.[1] When the quest was released an unused copy of each character from the quest was also added. For unknown reasons, the copy of the snake had been replaced by a tomato. A year later, it was given an official name and examine as a weird snake.

It is unknown whether the disguised tomato was the legacy of a mechanic cut before launch, or if it was just a joke by developers. Regardless, the unused NPC copies were all removed in a hidden update in 2007. As a result, it has never been present in Old School RuneScape.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Shauny. "In the Games Industry - An interview with Mod Ash!." (1:20:36), YouTube video. 20 February 2020.

The '''weird snake''' was a tomato in disguise that was released with the [[Monkey Madness I]] quest.

Monkey Madness I was notorious for its idiosyncratic development and coding compared to the rest of the game.{{CiteVideo|author=Shauny|title=In the Games Industry - An interview with Mod Ash!|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PiBigfDrA4k0|timestamp=1:20:36|date=20 February 2020|site=|notes=|name=}} When the quest was released an unused copy of each character from the quest was also added. For unknown reasons, the copy of the [[Snake (Ape Atoll)|snake]] had been replaced by a tomato. A year later, it was given an official name and examine as a weird snake.

It is unknown whether the disguised tomato was the legacy of a mechanic cut before launch, or if it was just a joke by developers. Regardless, the unused NPC copies were all removed in a hidden update in 2007. As a result, it has never been present in ''Old School RuneScape''.
